p: When stockouts occurred, the staff at the facilities substituted the missing ARV with other ARV formulations or regimens, referred patients to other centres, or asked them to return later. Similar coping strategies have been described in response to ART stockouts in Tanzania, leading to increased cost for patients, higher risk of treatment interruption and emergence of resistant strains [ 25]. TDF stockouts occurring in 2012 in South Africa led to initiation of patients with less optimal regimens, patients having to return more frequently and an increase in missed drug pick-ups [ 26].
